* Iron continued to walk down the hall with her hand behind her back...head 
held high and nose pointing towards the roof.  That was...until she suddenly 
heard missile fire from behind.
She suddenly spun around and held her arms out.*

" I DIDN'T SAY " OPEN FIRE!" "

* Seeing that the weapons were already shot she whips around and b-lines it 
towards a far corner, zipping behind and disappearing into it's shadows.
From out of the shadows...*

" OK, NOW you can start."

* She grumbles from she shadows,* " Now I know why Liono left...because 
they'de be shooting at HIM next!"

* Soon after, the hallway IR slipping into, was empty.  Not even a spark 
signature could be found.*
